taskDefinition.name: BMC ITSM7 Work Order Work Info Create
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a BMC ITSM7 Work Order Work Info record based upon the parameters provided.

parameter.label: Work Order ID:
parameter.tooltip: The work order id number of the work order to associate the Work Order Work Info entry with.

parameter.label: Include Review Request:
parameter.tooltip: Option to prepend the review request URL to the Notes of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Include Question Answers:
parameter.tooltip: Option to append the question answer pairs to the Notes of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Summary:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Summary of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Notes:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Notes of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Submit Date:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Date of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Attachment Question Menu Label 1:
parameter.tooltip: The menu label of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment Question Menu Label 2:
parameter.tooltip: The menu label of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment Question Menu Label 3:
parameter.tooltip: The menu label of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Submitter:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Submitter of the Work Order Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Locked:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Work Order Work Info entry Locked status.

parameter.label: View Access:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Work Order Work Info entry to Public or Internal.

parameter.label: Work Info Source:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Work Order Work Info Communication Source value. Options include to Email, Fax, Phone, Voice Mail, Walk In, Pager, System Assignment, Web, and Other.

parameter.label: Work Info Type:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Work Order Work Info Type value. Many options exist for this field. The most commonly used is 'General Information'

parameter.label: Source Instance ID:
parameter.tooltip: The instance id of the submission you want data returned from. Typically the originating service item in a parent/child scenario.

parameter.label: Source Survey Template ID:
parameter.tooltip: The instance id of the survey template you want data returned from.

parameter.label: Default Web Server:
parameter.tooltip: Instance ID of the submission that should be used to retrieve answers.
